ModMetaData.name: CustomUIScales - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Taggerung
ModMetaData.description: Allow more custom UI scales than the ones in the normal list (This is the dev version of CustomUIScales. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
